snippet: Mr. Bush continues to be ignored, and to languish in the polls, even as the nation contends with what he calls “serious times that require serious leadership.”
abstract: Republican presidential candidate Jeb Bush fails to regain earlier momentum in polls; recent terrorist  attacks in Paris have provided Bush with opportunity to discuss tactics dealing with Islamic State but critics call into question his ability to carry them out as an effective commander in chief.

byline.original: By TRIP GABRIEL and ASHLEY PARKER

lead_paragraph: Mr. Bush continues to be ignored, and to languish in the polls, even as the nation contends with what he calls “serious times that require serious leadership.”

headline.main: Jeb Bush’s New Show of Confidence Is Failing to Connect With Republicans
headline.print_headline: Bush’s New Show of Confidence Is Failing to Connect With Republicans

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
